title: ENCODE experiment dataset
description: Schema for submitting a primary set of files (experiment) to ENCODE
comment: Experiment is a special case of Dataset indicating the primary replicated dataset that submitted files belong to.

description.description: A plain text description of the experimental dataset
description.comment: This should have a clear indication of the relavant experimental variables
description.title: Experiment description

target.description: Protein, RNA, or chemical target of the experiment
target.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Target label or UUID.  Some experiments will have no target and some exeriments have the target of Control.
target.title: Target label

assay_term_name.description: Ontology term describing the assay used for this experiment
assay_term_name.comment: Use OBI ontology term or follow the procedure for New Term Request
assay_term_name.title: Assay type

assay_term_id.description: The specific OBI ontology term ID describing assay used for this experiment
assay_term_id.comment: Use OBI ontology term_id or New Term Requst no. from the DCC
assay_term_id.title: Assay ontology (OBI) ID

geo_dbxrefs.description: List of GEO dbxrefs (GSE or GSM#s)
geo_dbxrefs.title: GEO DBXREFs

encode2_dbxrefs.description: List of cross-references to the previous ENCODE system
encode2_dbxrefs.comment: For experiments, these will look like wgEncode*
encode2_dbxrefs.title: ENCODE2 DBXREFs

documents.description: List of relevant experimental protocol documents
documents.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Document names or uuids, these documents are not required to be of type protocol
documents.title: Document list

files.description: List of files in this experiment
files.comment: For automatic submission supply unique data File accessions or uuids
files.title: Data file list

references.description: List of references (Pubmed IDs) relating to this experiment
references.comment: References can only be submitted as Pubmed IDs
references.title: References

reference.description: Pubmed ID for a published reference
reference.title: Pubmed Reference

possible_controls.description: List of control experiments that could apply to this experiment
possible_controls.comment: For automatic submission supply Experiment (dataset) accessions or uuids
possible_controls.title: Possible Control experiments list
